review: LOVE IT!  Easy to set up and easy to use. Reliable with wi-fi and simple. I don't know what else to say. I had no issues hooking up to TV and it worked immediately when plugged in. Definitely worth the money! No more cable TV!  Saving lots of $$$$.
author: K. Arnold "bodogs1"

review: Disappointed there are not more new movies on the fire stick.
author: suzanne peters

review: Since I already have a "smart TV" to watch most of the time, I decided to get this for my bedroom TV.  Compared to the "smart TV", it is little hard to get used to and not as easy to use.  The main screen is different.  But it works beautifully once I figured it out.  My wi-fi is pretty fast, so there is no problem with buffering of downloads.  I couldn't give it 5 stars, because I am hooked on the "smart TV", but considering the fantastic price, it is just what I wanted for my 2nd TV.  I recommend it.
author: Shar

review: Love it, one of my best purchases.

review: I'm upset with myself for waiting so long. I jumped on the Chromecast right away and loved it. Worked perfect for my non-smart TV. But this has tons more content available and easy for my whole family to use. I'm buying a second one now.
